verses.kjv: My son, forget not my law; but let thine heart keep my commandments:
verses.ct: My son, don't forget what I've taught you; hold my commands close to your heart.

verses.kjv: For length of days, and long life, and peace, shall they add to thee.
verses.ct: They will give you a long, full life and bring you peace.

verses.kjv: Let not mercy and truth forsake thee: bind them about thy neck; write them upon the table of thine heart:
verses.ct: Never let go of loyalty and faithfulness — tie them around your neck and engrave them deep in your heart.

verses.kjv: So shalt thou find favour and good understanding in the sight of God and man.
verses.ct: Then you will earn the approval and respect of both God and people.

verses.kjv: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
verses.ct: Put your complete trust in the LORD, and don't rely on your own reasoning.

verses.kjv: In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
verses.ct: Include him in every decision you make, and he will guide your steps.

verses.kjv: Be not wise in thine own eyes: fear the LORD, and depart from evil.
verses.ct: Don't assume you already have all the answers. Be wholeheartedly dedicated to the LORD and turn away from evil.

verses.kjv: It shall be health to thy navel, and marrow to thy bones.
verses.ct: This will bring healing to your body and strength to your bones.

verses.kjv: Honour the LORD with thy substance, and with the firstfruits of all thine increase:
verses.ct: Honor the LORD with your wealth and with the first portion of everything you earn.

verses.kjv: So shall thy barns be filled with plenty, and thy presses shall burst out with new wine.
verses.ct: Then your storehouses will overflow with abundance, and your vats will be bursting with fresh wine.

verses.kjv: My son, despise not the chastening of the LORD; neither be weary of his correction:
verses.ct: My son, don't resent it when the LORD disciplines you, and don't grow tired of his correction.

verses.kjv: For whom the LORD loveth he correcteth; even as a father the son in whom he delighteth.
verses.ct: Because the LORD corrects those he loves, just like a father disciplines the child he treasures.

verses.kjv: Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding.
verses.ct: How fortunate is the person who discovers wisdom — the one who gains understanding.

verses.kjv: For the merchandise of it is better than the merchandise of silver, and the gain thereof than fine gold.
verses.ct: The profit she brings is greater than silver, and her returns surpass fine gold.

verses.kjv: She is more precious than rubies: and all the things thou canst desire are not to be compared unto her.
verses.ct: She is worth more than rubies, and nothing you could ever want compares to her.

verses.kjv: Length of days is in her right hand; and in her left hand riches and honour.
verses.ct: In her right hand she holds long life, and in her left hand she carries wealth and honor.

verses.kjv: Her ways are ways of pleasantness, and all her paths are peace.
verses.ct: Her roads are filled with joy, and every path she takes leads to peace.

verses.kjv: She is a tree of life to them that lay hold upon her: and happy is every one that retaineth her.
verses.ct: She is a tree of life to everyone who embraces her, and those who hold on to her are truly fortunate.

verses.kjv: The LORD by wisdom hath founded the earth; by understanding hath he established the heavens.
verses.ct: The LORD used wisdom to lay the foundation of the earth; through understanding he set the heavens in place.

verses.kjv: By his knowledge the depths are broken up, and the clouds drop down the dew.
verses.ct: Through his knowledge the deep waters burst open, and the clouds released their dew.

verses.kjv: My son, let not them depart from thine eyes: keep sound wisdom and discretion:
verses.ct: My son, don't let these slip from your sight — guard sound judgment and careful thinking.

verses.kjv: So shall they be life unto thy soul, and grace to thy neck.
verses.ct: They will bring life to your soul and grace like a jewel around your neck.

verses.kjv: Then shalt thou walk in thy way safely, and thy foot shall not stumble.
verses.ct: Then you will travel your road with confidence, and your foot won't trip.

verses.kjv: When thou liest down, thou shalt not be afraid: yea, thou shalt lie down, and thy sleep shall be sweet.
verses.ct: When you go to bed, you won't be anxious; you will rest, and your sleep will be refreshing.

verses.kjv: Be not afraid of sudden fear, neither of the desolation of the wicked, when it cometh.
verses.ct: Don't be terrified by sudden disaster or by the ruin that strikes the wicked.

verses.kjv: For the LORD shall be thy confidence, and shall keep thy foot from being taken.
verses.ct: Because the LORD will be your security, and he will protect your feet from every trap.

verses.kjv: Withhold not good from them to whom it is due, when it is in the power of thine hand to do it.
verses.ct: Don't hold back something good from someone who deserves it when you have the ability to give it.

verses.kjv: Say not unto thy neighbour, Go, and come again, and to morrow I will give; when thou hast it by thee.
verses.ct: Don't tell your neighbor, 'Come back tomorrow and I'll help you then,' when you already have what they need right now.

verses.kjv: Devise not evil against thy neighbour, seeing he dwelleth securely by thee.
verses.ct: Don't plot to harm your neighbor, especially when he lives beside you trusting you.

verses.kjv: Strive not with a man without cause, if he have done thee no harm.
verses.ct: Don't pick a fight with someone for no reason, if they haven't done anything to hurt you.

verses.kjv: Envy thou not the oppressor, and choose none of his ways.
verses.ct: Don't be jealous of violent people, and don't adopt any of their methods.

verses.kjv: For the froward is abomination to the LORD: but his secret is with the righteous.
verses.ct: The LORD despises the dishonest, but he shares his confidence with those who live right.

verses.kjv: The curse of the LORD is in the house of the wicked: but he blesseth the habitation of the just.
verses.ct: The LORD's curse falls on the household of the wicked, but he blesses the home of the righteous.

verses.kjv: Surely he scorneth the scorners: but he giveth grace unto the lowly.
verses.ct: He mocks those who mock others, but he gives grace to the humble.

verses.kjv: The wise shall inherit glory: but shame shall be the promotion of fools.
verses.ct: The wise will receive honor as their reward, but fools will only gain disgrace.
